LanguageData.GenericPenis.label: generic penis
LanguageData.GenericPenis.description: A penis with a shaft that's thick at the base, but tappers to a point.
LanguageData.GenericVagina.label: generic vagina
LanguageData.GenericVagina.description: A self-lubrifying hole capable of childbirth.
LanguageData.GenericAnus.label: generic anus
LanguageData.GenericAnus.description: A wrinkled hole that's the end of the digestive system.
LanguageData.GenericBreasts.label: generic breasts
LanguageData.GenericBreasts.description: A pair of glands capable of producing milk to feed the young.
